comment:
* Class used to clone a node, possibly including its children to 
 * a result tree.
 * @xsl.usage internal

methods.name: public static void cloneToResultTree(int node, int nodeType, DTM dtm, SerializationHandler rth, boolean shouldCloneAttributes) throws TransformerException
methods.comment:
* Clone an element with or without children.
   * TODO: Fix or figure out node clone failure!
   * the error condition is severe enough to halt processing.
   *
   * @param node The node to clone
   * @param shouldCloneAttributes Flag indicating whether to 
   * clone children attributes
   * 
   * @throws TransformerException

methodNames: public static void cloneToResultTree(int node, int nodeType, DTM dtm, SerializationHandler rth, boolean shouldCloneAttributes) throws TransformerException
